responsibilities.term: coordinate electrical construction jobs and projects
context_sentences: The primary responsibilities of the Master Electrician are to work directly with the Electrical Field Operations Manager to coordinate electrical construction jobs and projects
Work with Management to develop crew schedules and determine resource requirements to maintain maximum efficiency and production for each job

responsibilities.term: read and interpret blueprints and technical drawings
context_sentences: Reads and interpret blueprints, plans, sketches, or product specifications to determine sequence and methods of assembly and installation
Good communication skills, the ability to lift and carry up to 50 pounds, and the ability to read and comprehend technical manuals and blueprints
Attends and contributes to pre-construction meetings upon request
Attends on site coordination meetings with customer and salesman upon request of the Manager

responsibilities.term: work with inspectors and fire marshalls
context_sentences: Work directly with local Fire Marshalls, Inspectors, and other officials in our effort to perform our work according to the rules and guidelines set forth by State and National Agencies
Stage and select materials based on information provided by salesman and estimator, as indicated on drawings or other written instruction

responsibilities.term: lay out and mark work area dimensions
context_sentences: Lay out and mark dimensions and reference lines in work area to determine actual locations of system components, as described in drawings
Operate tools and equipment necessary to safely and efficiently complete assigned tasks
Leads and oversees the work of lower level electrician/maintenance mechanics through the successful completion of projects
Work directly with other Journeymen or other crew leaders to ensure continuity of work

responsibilities.term: develop and utilize job safety analysis
context_sentences: Review specific safety events for projects. Develop and utilize JSA (Job Safety Analysis) for all work performed and on a daily basis
Develops and Utilizes JSA (Job Safety Analysis) for each day's work
Aid in the education and enforcement of company policy and procedures, including site safety concerns
Understands, complies, and enforces JF Petroleum Group safety policies
Provides comprehensive plans for proposed work
Periodically reviews work plan to assure that all information, tools and materials required are present prior to beginning work

responsibilities.term: train and mentor apprentices and helpers
context_sentences: helping to ensure quality and proper training of Crew Leaders and Helpers
Work with apprentice to set goals for personal production based on job schedule and budget requirements
Reports accidents or injuries to management immediately. Aids in the investigation and documentation of job-related accidents
Must also have thorough knowledge of high voltage (over 2,000 up to 35,000) transmission and distribution equipment used in large industrial or utility distribution generation system
Must have training in estimating and planning electrical work
Must have training in estimating and planning electrical work

the ability to read and comprehend technical manuals and blueprints

Understands, complies, and enforces OSHA safety requirements
planning, organizing, and controlling resources to maximize productivity

Licensure as an electrical contractor by the State of New Jersey

qualifications.term: commercial driver's license may be required
context_sentences: May be required to obtain a Commercial Drivers License
